reviewText: I was not impressed.  This is really for young kids just learning about the body.  It reminds me of a car commercial that doesn't describe the features and actual mechanics of the car, but instead talks mostly about how the car will change my life and get me money and girlfriends.  I regret buying this and now must decide to resell it or donate it to the library.
This is a high-quality documentary, show-casing latest research in an understandable way. Excellent footage included. It is pitched well for secondary Biology students.
